channel.title: ProjectPkz|New Server|Great Eco|Needs Staff|Great Coders|24/7 VPS
channel.description:
[img]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/519/projectpkzrsps.webs.com/Untitled-1.png[/img]
We have come far to get this to where it is now and there is no going back, Hours of day, Hours of night, Sweat and fustration, But behold it is here!
We are a Economy based community, Pk'ing, PvM and Skilling with 100% server up-time Guaranteed! We have plenty of features, minigames and so much more!
Project PKz Features: -Active Teamspeak Server -Active Forums -Respectful, Considerate, Dedicated Admin team. -Stable Economy with No rollbacks or resets. -Flawless Pking, PvM and Skilling with the best exp rates. -Working Barrows, Toktz-Jad, Pest Control, Duel Arena and Warriors Guild minigames. -Working Tormented Demons, Corporal Beast, Dagganoth Kings and 4 Godwars Dungeon bosses. -Trainable Hunter & Summoning. -Pk'ing weapons and armour + Chaotics. -Plenty of events weekly for ultimate prizes!
You're probably thinking, "What's so good about Project PKz that makes it worth playing?" The playing experience is like none other. We here at Project PKz want to make your time here well worth playing, there are plenty of rare items to get your hands on and this is where we are different, like no other. The rares will only be tradable to one another and can not be gained any other way! This means once we have given out Partyhats or Masks that will be it!
There will also be another similar drop party that will have the special trimmed armour and holiday items up for grabs! The ultimate private server with the rares around that will encourage everyone to work there way up to getting all the rares they can get.
We also have some of the best Donation deals around and the best part is you can either pay using real life money or you can pay with rsgp!
There is nothing like Project PKz so don't waste your time with other servers, come and join PROJECT PKZ today!
Forums: [url=http://projectpkzrsps.site90.com/index.php]http://projectpkzrsps.site90.com/index.php[/url]

We have come far to get this to where it is now and there is no going back,
Hours of day, Hours of night, Sweat and fustration, But behold it is here!

There will also be another similar drop party that will have the special trimmed armour and
